name: Dave And Bambi Mega Games! (itch.io Version!)
name_original: Dave And Bambi Mega Games! (itch.io Version!)
description:
This Game is Inspired By The WarioWare Series!

Watch The Controls While Dave Is Saying!

There is only 1 rule: Do not cheat the game!

Remember! If you got a game over when you have a high score, wait for 3 seconds and then it will run high score script!
